query.name: com.txoof.brightspace.org.05offerings
query.sql:
/* 05_offerings.named_queries.xml
build courses based on student and teacher schedules */ -- 05 course offerings select distinct 'course offering' as "type", 'UPDATE' as "action", /* Include schoolid, course_number and termid co_cc.schoolid_cc.course_number_cc.termid co_3_SPHYIBS2_3200 */ 'co_'||cc.schoolid||'_'||cc.course_number||'_'||cc.termid as "code", c.course_name||' ('||terms.abbreviation||')' as "name", TERMS.FIRSTDAY as "start_date", TERMS.LASTDAY as "end_date", /* set courses as inactive by default */ 1 as "is_active", '' as "department_code", 'Templ_'||CC.SCHOOLID||'_'||C.SCHED_DEPARTMENT as "template_code", 'term_'||cc.termid as "semester_code", '' as "offering_code", '' as "custom_code" from students s join cc on cc.studentid = s.id join schoolstaff ss on ss.id = cc.teacherid join courses c on c.course_number = cc.course_number, terms terms where terms.id = cc.termid and /* select only courses that are in the current yearid (e.g. 2021-2022 == 3100)*/ cc.termid >= case when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) >= 1 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 6) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+9)*100 when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) >= 7 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 12) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+10)*100 end order by "code" desc
